adHeader: ARE YOU MOVING AND NEED TO HAUL YOUR STUFF? I CAN HELP YOU!
adDetails: I have a toyota tacoma pickup truck and also an enclosed trailer 6'x12', if you are moving and need to haul your stuff small or big, Rain or Shine, or if you're buying stuff through CRAIGSLIST, IKEA, BEST BUY, COSTCO, WALMART, TARGET, etc. I can help you to haul it. I have plenty of blankets, straps, tiedowns, dollies. You would get my help to load and unload your stuff, you won't pay any extra fees for the gas. I'am very professional, and my rates are very affordable. I AM FLEXIBLE AND AN EASY GOING PERSON. All you have to do is give me a call at show contact info. MY NAME IS IGNACIO. THANKS!
